column5: A deal at twice the price. Thanks for the heads-up Dan  -Brian
WOW!  You are a true Internet Guru Dan!  That looks like the Chuck from the Octagon days.  He was even badder back then then he is now.     Even with really bad pants.   Stellar work.
If I ever got my feet that far apart they'd have to sew me back together,   never mind the pants!
Yeah, that's what I need alright.
He really is at a disadvantage in that position.
I could have used a pair of those when i slid down the launch ramp at Beaverton last October damn slime!
It's not that the pants are action jeans it's the fact that they are afraid to rip when chuck norris wears them!LOL!
Betcha Oprah can do that but it wouldn't be pretty.
my uncle was the "ass double" for that add, there ARE some stunts that even chuck can't do

I often set the hook on the tip-down by running over and giving the thing a good kick.  Now I surely will never miss a hookset again, and, I'll be looking real fashionable at a good price while I ice fish.  Thanks Dan.  You truly bring great things here to OFC. lol
this is a great thread.  ..im still laughing....thanks danC...lol
